scripts.build:shell: pnpm livraison script --target sh --name Livraison --download-url 'https://github.com/timotheeguerin/livraison/releases/download/{version}/{filename}' --latest-download-url 'https://github.com/timotheeguerin/livraison/releases/latest/download/{filename}' --out install.sh --bin-name livraison
